definition: joined as a string of pearls/in rapid succession/alignment/Renju, a Japanese game, also called Gomoku or five-in-a-row
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
barrage of gunfire (often used as a metaphor for rapid speech)

sentences.english: Mr. Lin heaved sigh after sigh. Mrs. Lin's hiccups were like a string of firecrackers .
sentences.chinese: 林先生常常嘆氣，林大娘的打嗝像連珠炮。

sentences.english: It is an anthology that crackles with wit and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 這是一本妙語連珠篇篇充滿智慧的文集。

sentences.english: His answer was a torrent of abuses.
sentences.chinese: 他的回答是連珠炮式的“漫罵”。

sentences.english: He has a genius for epigram.
The journalists fired away at the spokesman as soon as he stopped talking.
sentences.chinese: 發言人一講完話，記者就像連珠炮似地對他發問。

sentences.english: They fired off so many questions at him that he hardly knew what to do.
sentences.chinese: 他們連珠炮似地問了他許多問題，弄得他不知所措。

sentences.english: I enjoy listening to their witty repartee.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡聽他們妙語連珠的對答。

sentences.english: There existed different opinions about the origin of lianzhu, a literary style in ancient Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 關於連珠的起源，歷來意見不一。

sentences.english: He is most kind man, and he has given everything for renju.
sentences.chinese: 他是個非常善良的人，他爲連珠奉獻了一切。

sentences.english: The journalist suddenly launched into intensive questioning.
sentences.chinese: 這位記者突然連珠炮似地發起問來。

sentences.english: The new arrival was befuddled by the rapid-fire conversation.
sentences.chinese: 新到達者被連珠炮似的談話弄糊塗了。

sentences.english: The reporters turned to him and started peppering him with questions.
sentences.chinese: 記者們轉臉望向他，連珠炮似地向他發問。

sentences.english: His words came out in quick succession.
sentences.chinese: 他的話連珠炮似地說了出來。

sentences.english: China Jing Du Renju Federation has the ambition to arrange a World Championship of Renju in the future.
sentences.chinese: 中國京都連珠協會將努力準備舉辦世界連珠錦標賽。

sentences.english: China Jing Du Renju Federation has the ambition to arrange a World Championship of Renju in the future.
sentences.chinese: 中國京都連珠協會將努力準備舉辦世界連珠錦標賽。

definition: base (of a triangle)/base line/hem line (of skirt)
